title: U.S. Christmas lights energy costs
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Lighting Type, and Energy cost in U.S. dollars in each Lighting Type on the y axis.
The Energy cost in U.S. dollars is highest at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and lowest at Lighting Type LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).
The highest Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) has 27.15 more Energy cost in U.S. dollars than the lowest Lighting Type LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).
